synopsis.text: Our protagonist Tsubasa lands a job in the A&R department of major record label Gandala Music. She is swiftly put in charge of managing their idol group B-PROJECT, consisting of units Kitakore, THRIVE, and MooNs. Despite some early mishaps, Tsubasa and B-PROJECT put on a successful debut concert at the prestigious Japan Dome. In the second season, B-PROJECT continues to grow with the addition of new unit KiLLER KiNG. Tsubasa navigates various interpersonal and professional challenges as she manages a group of talented yet wildly different artists. From overcoming corporate shake-ups at Gandala Music to prepping new releases and concerts, Tsubasa and B-PROJECT strive for success in the competitive entertainment industry. Along the way, close bonds are formed as the team tackles obstacles together. With music and youth on their side, B-PROJECT sets out to make their mark on the industry and win over legions of fans. Tsubasa plays a pivotal role behind-the-scenes supporting the group's aspirations. Though the road ahead is long, each member lends their unique skills and personalities to ascend to fame.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
